name: PyuTas
description:
PyuTas is a game about pew pew(lasers) and insane shootouts with lasers. You are the computer user who tries to clear his local network from the computer virus. Use your only weapon(lasers) to vaporize the infection. Good luck!

***************************Disclaimer**************************

This game is a prototype created to test the game concept. This game may or may not become a full game. Please report any bugs. 

*****************************************************************
